mapper.select: SELECT op.product_id AS productId, op.total_sum AS sum, p.product_name AS productName, p.product_sub_name AS productSubName, p.price AS price, p.stock AS stock, p.THUMBNAIL_IMAGE_URL AS thumbnailImageUrl FROM ( SELECT top.product_id, SUM(top.ORDER_PRODUCT_COUNT) AS total_sum FROM TBL_ORDERPRODUCT top JOIN tbl_product tp ON top.product_id = tp.product_id JOIN tbl_store ts ON tp.store_id = ts.store_id WHERE tp.deleted_at IS NULL AND ts.member_id = #{memberId} GROUP BY top.product_id ORDER BY total_sum DESC ) op JOIN tbl_product p ON op.product_id = p.product_id WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
